title: Design Strategies for Incorrect Answer Choices to Improve Online Learning Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical training environment to strengthen science education content creation skills for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of various incorrect answer choice formats (e.g., compound logic-type, simple misconception-type) on learning outcomes in online assessments.
Learners can design experimental procedures to measure the effectiveness of changes in incorrect answer choice formats using pre-post test designs.
Learners can directly create and improve assessment items incorporating incorrect answer choice types in VR-based simulation environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
